summary: An FBI intake document summarizing an anonymous tip received on August 10, 2020, regarding Jeffrey Epstein and child sex trafficking. The anonymous female caller alleges her father, an attorney in Florida, was a former recruiter for Epstein, that she and her siblings were 'sold' throughout childhood, and that she took a photograph of Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell in 2001.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the child sex trafficking allegations reported by the anonymous caller.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Mentioned by the anonymous caller as being 'around' when the caller met Epstein at age four.

persons.name: Prince Andrew
persons.context: The anonymous caller claims she was the one who took a photograph of Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell in 2001.

connections.description: Maxwell is mentioned as being present around the time the anonymous caller met Epstein, suggesting an association in the alleged trafficking context.
The caller's claim of taking a photograph of Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell in 2001 implies a social connection between Epstein's circle and Prince Andrew.
The caller claims to have photographed them together in 2001.

events.title: Photograph of Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: The anonymous caller claims she was the one who took a photograph of Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Anonymous Tip to FBI
events.description: An anonymous female caller contacted the FBI National Threat Operations Center to report information related to Jeffrey Epstein and child sex trafficking.

keyFacts: An anonymous female caller reported her father, an attorney residing in Tarpon Springs, FL, was a former recruiter for Jeffrey Epstein.
The caller alleges she and her five siblings were 'sold' throughout their entire childhood and she met Epstein when she was four years old.
The caller claims she was the one who took the photograph of Prince Andrew and Ghislaine Maxwell in 2001.
The caller expressed fear that her father, who is attempting to get full custody of her child, would traffic the child as well.
The FBI intake document was created on August 11, 2020, based on a tip received the prior evening.
